title: I don't even know
text_content: Why are you here reading this?

title: Ruby
text_content: The best part of Ruby is I get to write interesting logic. You should too.

title: U. Penn Coding Boot Camp
text_content: For anyone interested in switching careers into tech, this boot camp is where it's at! The instructors are field experts, and there is a fleet of people to support you along the way.

title: Don't give up!
text_content: 1) Block time into your weekly schedule to study, research, read, and watch videos. Try to work up to 20 hours each week.

title: What are you lookin' at?
text_content: It's a pun. Get it? Honestly, the best kind of coding is back-end because there is no need to worry about layout and colors.
